detail_desc: Long, sleeveless dress in an airy, patterned jacquard weave. Narrow cut at the top with an elasticated neckline and short shoulder straps with a sewn-on bow at one side. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Satin lining.
Wide blouse in a soft weave with gathered details, a stand-up collar with buttons at the back of the neck and long, raglan, balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with concealed press-studs at the back. Seam and a sewn-on bow at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini top with shaped triangular cups and removable inserts. Narrow, adjustable multiway shoulder straps.

Coat in an Italian wool blend with a stand-up collar and concealed press-studs at the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and one inner pocket. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Joggers in a sturdy, patterned jacquard weave with elastication and ties at the waist.
Hat in braided, nepped paper straw with a twisted band and bow. Width of brim. 9 cm.
Swim top with long raglan sleeves and patterned inset panels at the sides.
Metal necklaces with pendants. One shorter, two-strand necklace and one longer one. Adjustable length, 45-52 cm and 68-75 cm.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a decorative lace trim and bow at the top, and press-studs at the crotch.
Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Jumper in a soft chunky knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and roll edges.
Wide hairband in cotton jersey with a twisted detail.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with ribbed shafts and elasticated tops.

Popover jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood, concealed zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening at the top, a zipped chest pocket and side pockets. Concealed zip in the sides, and elastication at the cuffs. Fleece lining.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Sandals with a zip and loop at the back of the heels. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
T-shirt in organic slub cotton jersey with an open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Knee-length dress in soft modal and cotton jersey. Double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a drawstring at the waist.
Fine-knit gloves in a wool blend with reinforced palms in imitation suede and foldover ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining.

Lace push-up body with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Bolero in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves with roll edges.
Lightweight, unlined sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a short, ribbed shaft.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with decorative stitching at the knees and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with elastication and a flounce at the top.
Loafers in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave. Patterned soles.
Suede clutch bag with a flap and concealed magnetic fastener and decorative metal buckle. Detachable metal chain shoulder strap and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 4x15x27 cm.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Knee-length, A-line skirt in a sturdy weave with a slight sheen. High waist and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Ribbed tights in a soft wool blend with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut top in cotton jersey with and opening and button at the back of the neck, a cut-out section with drawstring at the shoulders and short sleeves.

Trousers in a cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and slim legs. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with buttons down the front. High waist with covered elastication at the back and pleats at the front for added width. Unlined.
Top in organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in slub cotton jersey with a yoke at the front trimmed with a flounce in woven fabric with broderie anglaise.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
A-line dress in tulle with embroidered appliqués in the shape of pineapples. Narrow, elasticated shoulder straps and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem. Lined.
Padded sleep mask with an elastic strap at the back. Polyester lining.

Sweatpants in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend. Regular waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, discreet pockets in the side seams and a welt back pocket. Gently tapered, ankle-length legs with creases down the front and good room for movement over the thighs and knees.
Short top in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a sewn-in wrapover. Lined at the front.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped front pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Sleeveless, jacquard-weave dress in silk and recycled polyester with a deep V-neck front and back, discreet shoulder pads and a concealed zip at the back. Lining in a Tencel™ lyocell blend.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Suede boots with lacing at the front, a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.

Long kaftan in a patterned viscose weave with a deep V-neck and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Double-layered yoke with gathered seams, wide, 3/4-length sleeves, a drawstring at the waist and slits at the front for added width. Unlined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a cotton jersey top and cotton velvet dungaree dress. Long-sleeved, patterned top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Dungaree dress with adjustable straps with a press-stud, front pockets and an opening with a concealed press-stud on one side.
Long wrapover skirt in leather with a button at the top. Lined.
Sleeveless jersey dress in a short and fitted style.
Fine-knit cashmere jumper with long raglan sleeves in a slightly shorter style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with embroidery and a round, gathered neckline with a V-shaped opening and ties at the front. Long raglan sleeves with drawstrings and frill trims at the cuffs.

Short jacket in a cashmere blend with a brushed finish. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the top with a concealed press-stud, and concealed pockets in the side seams. Straight cut with gentle draping. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Kimono in crushed velvet with a detachable tie belt, dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves.
V-neck blouse in a viscose crêpe weave in a relaxed fit with a gathered yoke at the back, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.
Leggings in soft, stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Top in satin with a slight sheen. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined at the top.
Short parka in washed cotton twill with a drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and press-studs at the cuffs. Zipped side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Short skirt in woven fabric with smocking at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels and a single button at the front. Welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Scarf in a soft, thin weave with fringed trims.
Metal rings in various designs.
Super-flared skirt in a crisp cotton weave with a wide, sewn-on tie belt at the waist, pleats at the top, side pockets and concealed buttons down the front. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in recycled polyester lace with a stand-up collar and an opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, a seam at the hips and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Kids Exclusive. Leggings in soft, lightweight wool jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Cargo shorts in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake flap back pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening.
